name: DONT WASTE JAMS: the rhythm game where you dodge stuff and listen to music
name_original: DONT WASTE JAMS: the rhythm game where you dodge stuff and listen to music
description:
Extract the .zip file.

Run dont-waste-jams.exe. There's a maze of various annoying dlls and stuff so watch out.

(if it's too hard, press esc)

Linux lads need ffplay installed.

Video

----

music - ~20hrs, musescore + GeneralUser soundfont

game - ~10hrs. dotnet w/ monogame

design - 35hrs, everything is sequenced in musescore & exported as midi, read using DryWetMidi

getting ffplay to not buffer stderr - an all nighter

art - barely an hour, krita

i used this https://freesound.org/people/MusicLegends/sounds/344300/
and this https://managore.itch.io/m5x7
